item.description:
let's meetup at johnny d's in davis square, somerville, to listen and dance to a great world funk/reggae band, entrain.

we've gotten together for entrain shows in the past -- everyone always loves them and everyone dances.

go to the Entrain Music page to check out their music. as an experiment, just listen to track # 24, Dancin' in the Light, and see if you can sit still.

didn't think so.

come on out with us and dance out of the darkness, into the light, toward the bar....


Notes

  • the music starts at 9:45 pm
  • the cover charge for this show is $15.
  • there is parking in the area, but it can be difficult to get a space.
  • see the johnny d's parking map here
  • the davis square T station is directly across the street
  • i have made dinner reservations for 12 people at 9 pm. at present (3:30, fri.), i have 11 people confirmed.
item.how_to_find_us: i'll send an email w/my cell # on friday afternoon, 17 july
item.name: Entrain @ Johnny D's
